go_data.justification: opn4b is a melanopsin-related gene, which suggests it has photoreceptor activity.
Strong expression of opn4b was found in distinct sublaminae of the INL.
The products of opn4b could provide necessary light information to zebrafish embryos before the retina is completely functional.
opn4b is expressed outside of the nervous system at 1 dpf, in cells within trunk and tail somites.
